DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this multicentre prospective trial is to determine the incidence and risk factors for surgical wound infections. Also the investigators will evaluate consequences of wound infections to the patients, and extra costs caused by wound infections.
DOC.brief_title: Surgical Wound Infections After Vascular Surgery: Prospective Multicenter Trial
DOC.criteria: nonemergency infrarenal aortic or lower limb arterial surgery patient's refusal to participate
